examples.instruction: Rewrite this text in another way
examples.input: People often think of cats as mysterious creatures because they are especially active at night. Also, their eyes can glow an eerie green light in the dark.
examples.output: Cats are often considered mystical creatures because they are particularly active at night. Also, their eyes can emit a strange green glow in dark environments.

examples.instruction: Extend the content from the brief description below.
examples.input: This is a great phone with a high-resolution display.
examples.output: This is an excellent phone with a high-performance processor for faster performance and smoother multitasking. Furthermore, it has a high-resolution display for crisp, vibrant images , allowing users to enjoy a better visual experience.
